traits.name: Mage

(Current: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MechanicTrait_100PushUps_TotalPercentDA@% %i:scaleDA%)

traits.name: Tank-zilla

traits.name: Fighter Spirit
traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) Gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:Health@ Health, @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:ADAP@% Attack Damage, and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:ADAP@% Ability Power for each Fighter or Assassin fielded.
(@MinUnits@) Increased to @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:Health@ %i:scaleHealth%, @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:ADAP@% %i:scaleAD%, and @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_FighterSpirit.1:ADAP@% %i:scaleAP%.

traits.name: Space Ace

At 0, move faster and gain @AS*100@% Attack Speed and @Durability*100@% Damage Reduction. (Weights Left: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_MechanicTrait_Weights_NumWeights@)

traits.name: Heavyweight
traits.desc:
Your team gains @TeamBonusHealth@ Health.

Heavyweights gain additional bonus Health, and Attack Damage equal to a percentage of their Health.

traits.name: The Crew

Crew champions gain @StatBonus*100@% Health and Attack Speed for each Crew member fielded.

Every 3-star Crew champion grants an additional bonus.

(1x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): +@XPPerReroll@ XP per paid reroll, and Crew unit odds never drop with player level.
(2x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): +1 free reroll / round.
(3x %i:3StarEnabled%%i:3StarDisabled%): Deal @BaseDamageThreshold@ damage to fire a rocket dealing @BaseRocketDamage@.

(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA% | @OverlordDamageAmp@% %i:scaleDA%

traits.name: Corrosive

traits.name: Soul Chipper

traits.name: Thrillseeker

(@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Thrillseeker.1:MinUnits@) Kills heal @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Thrillseeker.1:HealPercent@% max Health and grant @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Thrillseeker.1:AS*100@% Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds.
(@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Thrillseeker.2:MinUnits@) @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Thrillseeker.2:AS*100@% %i:scaleAS% on kill. Execute enemies below @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Thrillseeker.2:ExecuteThreshold*100@% Health.

Current Bounty Card:
@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_Trait_RogueCaptain_CurrentBounty@

traits.name: Resistant
traits.desc: Reduce each instance of incoming damage by @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Resistant.1:FlatDR@.

This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Mentors.

(1) Allies gain the bonus
(4) Mentors gain all bonuses and upgrade their abilities. Other allies gain nothing.

Kobuko: @Durability*100@% Damage Reduction
Udyr: @ADAP*100@% Attack Damage and Ability Power

augments.name: Crafted Crafting
augments.desc: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain @Rerolls@ rerolls.

augments.name: Lit Fuse
augments.desc: Units that start in the back two rows split @Mana@ total Mana after @DelaySeconds@ seconds of combat.

augments.name: Raining Gold+
augments.desc: Gain @InstantGold@ gold now and @RoundGold@ gold every round.

augments.name: Component Buffet
augments.desc:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

augments.name: Prizefighter
augments.desc: Gain @component@ item components. Every @WinsNeeded@ wins gives you an item component.

augments.name: Heroic Grab Bag
augments.desc:
Gain @LesserDuplicatorAmount@ Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain @Gold@ gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

augments.name: Exclusive Customization
augments.desc:
Gain a Lucky Item Chest and a Magnetic Remover and @Gold@ gold.

Use a Lucky Item Chest on a champion to choose from an armory of recommended items!

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain @HPBonus@ Health, @Stats@% Attack Damage, and @Stats@ Ability Power every round. Champions start with @StartingStacks@ stack of this effect, and can stack up to @MaxStacks@ times.

augments.name: Invested++
augments.desc: Gain @Gold@ gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every @GoldPerReroll@ gold above @GoldThreshold@ (max @MaxGold@ gold).

augments.name: Wand Overflow
augments.desc: Gain @NumItems@ Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +@BonusStat*100@% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Roll The Dice
augments.desc:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

augments.name: Greater Moonlight
augments.desc: Combat start: @NumUnits@ random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 4-star for that round and gains @ADBonus*100@% Attack Damage and @APBONUS@ Ability Power.

augments.name: Ascension
augments.desc: After @Delay@ seconds of combat, your units gain @DamageAmp@% Damage Amp.

augments.name: Lineup
augments.desc: Your team gains @Resistances@ Armor and Magic Resist for each unit that starts combat in the front two rows.

augments.name: Pandora's Items II
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain @NumComponents@ random components.

augments.name: Glass Cannon II
augments.desc: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at @Health*100@% health but gain @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp.

augments.name: Recombobulator
augments.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain @NumRemovers@ Magnetic Removers.

augments.name: Over Encumbered
augments.desc: For the next stage, you only get @BenchSlots@ bench slots. After, get @Components@ item components.

augments.name: Little Buddies
augments.desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain @health@ Health and @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed  for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Efficient Shopper
augments.desc: For the next @NumStages@ carousels, gain a second copy of the champion taken.

augments.name: Overheal
augments.desc: Every third attack deals an additional @BonusDamage*100@% damage and heals @PercentHeal*100@% of the damage. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to @MaxShield@ Health.

augments.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
augments.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal @damageamp1*100@-@damageamp4*100@% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for @heal*100@% of the damage dealt.

augments.name: Time Skip
augments.desc: Disable your Shop for the next @PenaltyTurns@ rounds. Then gain @Experience@ XP.

augments.name: Pumping Up III
augments.desc: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUp3Rounds@%)

augments.name: Pumping Up II
augments.desc: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUp2Rounds@%)

augments.name: Called Shot
augments.desc: Set your win streak to @Streak@. Gain @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Eye For An Eye+
augments.desc:
Gain a random component. For every @AllyDeaths@ ally champions that die, gain another component (max @NumComponents@).

Deaths Remaining: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEyeDeaths@

augments.name: Invested+
augments.desc: Gain @Gold@ gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every @GoldPerReroll@ gold above @GoldThreshold@ (max @MaxGold@ gold).

augments.name: Raining Gold
augments.desc: Gain @InstantGold@ gold now and @RoundGold@ gold every round.

augments.name: Cry Me A River
augments.desc: Gain a Tear of the Goddess. Your team gains @RegenBonus@ Mana Regen. After @DelayTime@ seconds in combat, increase this to @UpgradedRegenBonus@.

augments.name: A Magic Roll
augments.desc:
Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

Reward: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_MagicRoll@

augments.name: Sword Overflow
augments.desc: Gain @NumItems@ BF Swords. Your BF Swords grant +@BonusStat*100@% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Silver Destiny++
augments.desc: Gain a random Silver Augment and @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Clear Mind
augments.desc: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain @XP@ XP.

augments.name: Worth the Wait II
augments.desc:
Gain a random @unittier@-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_WorthTheWait@

augments.name: Titanic Titan
augments.desc: Increase your current and max player health by @Heal@. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

augments.name: Delayed Start
augments.desc: Sell your board and bench. Gain @NumUnits@ random 2-star @tier@-cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next @roundstoskip@ rounds.

augments.name: Wandering Trainer I
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy with @NumOfEmblems@ permanently attached Emblems. Gain @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Rolling For Days I
augments.desc: Gain @Numrolls@ free Shop rerolls.

augments.name: Protagonist
augments.desc: Gain a random 1-cost Champion Augment and a component item Anvil. Gain a copy of the champion at the start of every turn.

augments.name: Build a Bud!
augments.desc: Gain a random 3-star 1-cost champion. Gain @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Kingslayer
augments.desc: After winning player combat, gain @Gold@ gold. If they had more health than you, gain @WinBonusGold@ Gold instead. Gain @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Final Ascension
augments.desc: Your team gains @damageamp@% Damage Amp. After @delay@ seconds, this increases to @AscendedAmpTOOLTIPONLY@% Damage Amp.

augments.name: Noble Sacrifice
augments.desc: When your first ally dies each combat, grant your team @BaseResists@ + @SharePerc*100@% of that ally's Armor and Magic Resistance.

augments.name: Corrosion
augments.desc: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose @ResistLoss@ Armor and Magic Resist every @Time@ seconds.

augments.name: Starter Kit
augments.desc:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and @Gold@ gold.

At the start of the next @FutureChampionCount@ stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

augments.name: Lategame Specialist
augments.desc: When you reach Level @LevelReq@, gain @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Golemify
augments.desc: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Golem with @HealthPercent@% of their combined Health and @ADPercent@% of their combined Attack Damage. The Golem gains @HPPerStage@ Health per stage.

augments.name: Birthday Present
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star champion and @Gold@ gold every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (max: 5-cost).

augments.name: Pyromaniac
augments.desc: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal @BurnIncrease*100@% increased damage.

augments.name: Shimmerscale Essence
augments.desc:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In @combatnum@ rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

augments.name: Branching Out
augments.desc: Gain a random Emblem.

augments.name: Spoils of War III
augments.desc: Enemies have a @LootDropChance*100@% chance to drop loot when killed.

augments.name: Spoils of War II
augments.desc: Enemies have a @LootDropChance*100@% chance to drop loot when killed.

augments.name: Prismatic Destiny
augments.desc: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Spear's Will
augments.desc: Your team gains @AD*100@% Attack Damage and @Mana@ Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

augments.name: ReinFOURcement
augments.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Gold For Dummies
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. Every @GoldDuration@ seconds, all Training Dummies grant @GoldAmount@ gold.

augments.name: Quality Over Quantity
augments.desc:
Champions holding exactly 1 item upgrade that item to Radiant. Champions holding Radiant items gain @BonusHealth*100@% Health. Gain @NumRemovers@ Magnetic Removers.

Thief's Gloves counts as multiple items.

augments.name: Placebo
augments.desc: Your team gains @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed. Gain @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Malicious Monetization
augments.desc: Gain @GoldContained@ gold. For the next @Rounds@ rounds, enemy champions drop @PercCost@ gold when killed.

augments.name: Unlimited Power
augments.desc:
Gain a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Morellonomicon, a Needlessly Large Rod and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries!

augments.name: Cooking Pot
augments.desc: At the start of each turn, all units holding a Frying Pan or Spatula item grant the nearest champion @Health@ permanent Health. Gain a Frying Pan.

augments.name: Pandora's Items III
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

augments.name: Scavenger
augments.desc: The first @NumDeaths@ enemy champions that are killed each combat grant a champion on your team a temporary completed item.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Pilfer
augments.desc: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat.

augments.name: Big Grab Bag
augments.desc:
Gain @NumItems@ random components, @Gold@ gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

augments.name: Caretaker's Favor
augments.desc:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level @levelreqa@, @levelreqb@, @levelreqc@, and @levelreqd@.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

augments.name: Caretaker's Chosen
augments.desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level @levelreqa@: Component anvil
Level @levelreqb@: Completed item anvil
Level @levelreqc@: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

augments.name: Prismatic Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a @RerollPercent@% chance to gain a free reroll.

augments.name: Caretaker's Ally
augments.desc:
Gain a random @UnitTier@-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

Champion: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_WorthTheWait@

augments.name: Calculated Loss
augments.desc: After losing your combat, gain @Gold@ gold and a free Shop reroll.

augments.name: Sponging
augments.desc: Combat start: Up to @MaxUnits@ champions with @MaxItemsToBeEligible@ or fewer items gain a copy of a random completed item from the nearest itemized ally.

augments.name: Risky Moves
augments.desc: Your Tactician loses @Health@ Health, but after @PlayerCombatNum@ player combats, gain @Gold@ gold.

augments.name: Moonlight
augments.desc: Combat start: @NumUnits@ random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 3-star for that round and gains @ADBonus*100@% Attack Damage and @APBONUS@ Ability Power.

augments.name: Evil Beyond Measure
augments.desc: Your champions deal @BasePercentTrueDamage*100@% of their damage as True Damage for each Star level.

augments.name: Isekai
augments.desc: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Prodigy this game. Gain a Hand of Justice.

augments.name: Band of Thieves I
augments.desc: Gain @NumGloves@ Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Slice of Life
augments.desc: Twice per stage, gain a random champion. Its cost increases per stage. This effect ends after receiving @Max5Costs@ 5-cost champions.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every @NumberOfCombats@ player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Warpath
augments.desc:
Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing @PlayerDamage@ player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.
(Current: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_Warpath_DamageCount@)

augments.name: Radiant Relics
augments.desc:
Choose 1 of @ArmoryChoiceCount@ Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

augments.name: Another One!+
augments.desc: The next completed item you make grants another copy of it. Gain @NumComponents@ component.

augments.name: Big Friend II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat next to an ally with over @RequiredHealth@ Health gain @DamageReductionPercent@% Durability.

augments.name: Mace's Will
augments.desc: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains @AS*100@% Attack Speed and @CritChance*100@% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Know Your Enemy
augments.desc:
Your team deals @BaseDamageAmp@% more damage.

Deal @FullDamageAmp@% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

augments.name: Double Trouble
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain @BonusStats@% Attack Damage and @BonusStats@ Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Tons of Stats!
augments.desc: Your team gains @Health@ Health, @AttackDamage@% Attack Damage, @AbilityPower@ Ability Power, @Armor@ Armor, @MR@ Magic Resist, @AttackSpeed@% Attack Speed, and @Mana@ Mana.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan+
augments.desc: Gain @Heal@ player health and @Gold@ gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster. Gain @InitialGold@ gold now.

augments.name: Pair of Fours
augments.desc: If your team has exactly @NumCopies@ 4-cost champions, they each gain @Health@ Health and @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed. Gain a random 4-cost.

augments.name: Epoch
augments.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain @XP@ XP and @Rerolls@ free rerolls.

augments.name: Healing Orbs II
augments.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for @Heal@.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain @NumComponents@ random component.

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc:
Choose 1 of @ArmoryChoiceCount@ Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Latent Forge
augments.desc:
After @NumberOfCombats@ player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain @Health@ Health and restore @ManaRegen@ Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain @Health@ Health and restore @ManaRegen@ Mana per second.

augments.name: Deadlier Blades
augments.desc: Gain a Deathblade. Deathblades gain @AD*100@% Attack Damage per @Takedowns@ takedowns the wearer gets.

augments.name: Pumping Up II
augments.desc: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUp2Rounds@%)

augments.name: Pandora's Items II
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain @NumComponents@ random components.

augments.name: Caretaker's Favor
augments.desc:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level @levelreqa@, @levelreqb@, @levelreqc@, and @levelreqd@.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

augments.name: Underdogs
augments.desc: Whenever your team has fewer units alive than your opponent, your units regenerate @MissingHeal@% missing Health each second (Max: @HealCap@).
